tool_description: Converts route waypoints into detailed turn-by-turn navigation instructions with distance markers and landmarks.

instruction_detail.description: Level of instruction detail: basic, standard, detailed

error_messages: Invalid waypoints: Need at least 2 waypoints to generate navigation instructions.
Invalid detail level: Use one of [basic, standard, detailed].
Invalid unit system: Use either metric or imperial.
Route too complex: Maximum 200 waypoints allowed for instruction generation.
Instruction generation failed: Unable to process waypoints into navigation instructions.
usage: Provide route_waypoints array with coordinate sequence. Set instruction_detail for verbosity level, unit_system for distance units, and enable include_landmarks and voice_guidance for enhanced navigation experience.

maneuver_types.description: Type of maneuver: straight, left, right, u-turn, merge, exit

estimated_durations.description: Estimated time to reach each instruction point in minutes
